languages.text: "Да, именно что минимумом. Я иногда захаживаю к нашим сорванцам, и живут они несладко. И родителей нет, и быт как у новобранцев пехотных полков. Прошу, Ваша Светлость, не оставьте детишек без внимания".

"The bare minimum, yes. I sometimes check in on our little ragamuffins. They don't have it easy: no parents, and they live like new recruits in an infantry regiment. Please, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, do not neglect the children."
languages.original_text: "Да, именно что минимумом. Я иногда захаживаю к нашим сорванцам, и живут они несладко. И родителей нет, и быт как у новобранцев пехотных полков. Прошу, Ваша Светлость, не оставьте детишек без внимания".

traits.locale_text: "The bare minimum, yes. I sometimes drop in on our ragamuffins, and they don't have it easy. They have no parents, and they live like new recruits in an infantry regiment. Please, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, do not neglect the children."

"The bare minimum, yes. I sometimes drop in on our ragamuffins, and they don't have it easy. They have no parents, and they live like new recruits in an infantry regiment. Please, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, do not neglect the children."

"The bare minimum, yes. I sometimes check in on our little ragamuffins. They don't have it easy: no parents, and they live like new recruits in an infantry regiment. Please, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, do not neglect the children."

"The bare minimum, yes. I sometimes check in on our little ragamuffins. They don't have it easy: no parents, and they live like new recruits in an infantry regiment. Please, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, do not neglect the children."

"The bare minimum, yes. I sometimes check in on our little ragamuffins. They don't have it easy: no parents, and they live like new recruits in an infantry regiment. Please, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, do not neglect the children."

"The bare minimum, yes. I sometimes check in on our little ragamuffins. They don't have it easy: no parents, and they live like new recruits in an infantry regiment. Please, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, do not neglect the children."

languages.text: « Le strict minimum, vous voulez dire. Je mets un point d'honneur à passer régulièrement les voir. Il faut dire qu'ils ont pas la vie facile : en plus d'avoir perdu leurs parents, ils sont traités comme les nouvelles recrues d'un régiment d'infanterie. Je vous en supplie, Votre Seigneurie, ne négligez pas ces pauvres enfants. »
languages.original_text: "The bare minimum, yes. I sometimes check in on our little ragamuffins. They don't have it easy: no parents, and they live like new recruits in an infantry regiment. Please, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, do not neglect the children."

traits.locale_text: « Le strict minimum, vous voulez dire. Je mets un point d'honneur à passer régulièrement les voir. Il faut dire qu'ils ont pas la vie facile : en plus d'avoir perdu leurs parents, ils sont traités comme les nouvelles recrues d'un régiment d'infanterie. Je vous en supplie, Votre Seigneurie, ne négligez pas ces pauvres enfants. »

languages.text: «El mínimo absoluto, sí. A veces echo un vistazo a nuestros pequeñajos. No lo tienen nada fácil, sin padres y viviendo como nuevos reclutas en un regimiento de infantería. Por favor, mi{mf|lord|lady}, no ignore a los niños».
languages.original_text: "The bare minimum, yes. I sometimes check in on our little ragamuffins. They don't have it easy: no parents, and they live like new recruits in an infantry regiment. Please, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, do not neglect the children."

traits.locale_text: «El mínimo absoluto, sí. A veces echo un vistazo a nuestros pequeñajos. No lo tienen nada fácil, sin padres y viviendo como nuevos reclutas en un regimiento de infantería. Por favor, mi{mf|lord|lady}, no ignore a los niños».

languages.text: “是啊，他们仅仅拥有最低限度的保障。有的时候，我会去探望一下这些小可怜。他们的日子很艰难——他们失去了父母，就像军队里的新兵一样不知所措。拜托您了，大人，请不要忽视这些可怜的孩子。”
languages.original_text: "The bare minimum, yes. I sometimes check in on our little ragamuffins. They don't have it easy: no parents, and they live like new recruits in an infantry regiment. Please, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, do not neglect the children."

traits.locale_text: “是啊，他们仅仅拥有最低限度的保障。有的时候，我会去探望一下这些小可怜。他们的日子很艰难——他们失去了父母，就像军队里的新兵一样不知所措。拜托您了，大人，请不要忽视这些可怜的孩子。”

languages.text: 「最低限はです。私は時々、我が家の小さなラガマフィンたちの様子を見に行きます。両親はいないし、歩兵連隊の新兵のような生活をしています。なかなか大変な生活です。閣下、お願いします。子供たちの存在をおろそかにしないでください」
languages.original_text: "The bare minimum, yes. I sometimes check in on our little ragamuffins. They don't have it easy: no parents, and they live like new recruits in an infantry regiment. Please, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, do not neglect the children."

traits.locale_text: 「最低限はです。私は時々、我が家の小さなラガマフィンたちの様子を見に行きます。両親はいないし、歩兵連隊の新兵のような生活をしています。なかなか大変な生活です。閣下、お願いします。子供たちの存在をおろそかにしないでください」

languages.text: "Das unbedingt Nötigste, Ja. Manchmal sehe ich nach unseren kleinen Gassenkindern. Sie haben es nicht leicht. Keine Eltern, und sie leben wie neue Rekruten in einem Infanterieregiment. Bitte, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} vernachlässigt die Kinder nicht."
languages.original_text: "The bare minimum, yes. I sometimes check in on our little ragamuffins. They don't have it easy: no parents, and they live like new recruits in an infantry regiment. Please, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, do not neglect the children."

traits.locale_text: "Das unbedingt Nötigste, Ja. Manchmal sehe ich nach unseren kleinen Gassenkindern. Sie haben es nicht leicht. Keine Eltern, und sie leben wie neue Rekruten in einem Infanterieregiment. Bitte, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} vernachlässigt die Kinder nicht."

string_traits.trait: Встраивание генокрадов и офицеров в мейнсюжет (Зауэрбэк + Инфернус)
